attributes.action: ensure that all funds raised from congestion charging and/or road charging are fed directly into improvements in public transport.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government state that they wish to reduce traffic congestion and carbon emmissions but in reality both these schemes are another form of taxation which goes into central funding. If the money raised were to go directly into building improved public transport networks there would be less public resentment of these schemes. As they are few people believe that they are anything other than a stealth tax masquerading under the banner of a green agenda.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
